original_text: You bring bread to say “thank you”. You even bring lots of it and you tell everyone, “Look at how much I have brought.” You really like to do that. So continue to do it, but it does not make me happy.’ The Lord God says this!
korean_text: 누룩 넣은 것을 불살라 수은제로 드리며 낙헌제를 소리내어 선포하려무나 이스라엘 자손들아 이것이 너희가 기뻐하는 바니라 주 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: You bring bread to say "thank you"
You even bring lots of it
"Look at how much I have brought"
You really like to do that
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 정말 그렇게 하는 것을 좋아한다

sentences.original_text: but it does not make me happy
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그것은 나를 기쁘게 하지 않는다
